                <div class="ProfileSidebar ProfileSidebar--withLeftAlignment">
  <div class="ProfileHeaderCard">
  <h1 class="ProfileHeaderCard-name">
    <a href="/PaulBlomfieldMP" class="ProfileHeaderCard-nameLink u-textInheritColor js-nav">Paul Blomfield</a><span class="ProfileHeaderCard-badges"><a href="/help/verified" class="js-tooltip" target="_blank" title="Verified account" data-placement="right" rel="noopener"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></a></span>
  </h1>

  <h2 class="ProfileHeaderCard-screenname u-inlineBlock u-dir" dir="ltr">
    <a class="ProfileHeaderCard-screennameLink u-linkComplex js-nav" href="/PaulBlomfieldMP">
      <span class="username u-dir" dir="ltr">@<b class="u-linkComplex-target">PaulBlomfieldMP</b></span>
    </a>
  </h2>

  

      <p class="ProfileHeaderCard-bio u-dir" dir="ltr">Labour MP for Sheffield Central. Shadow Brexit Minister. Citizens Advice MP of Year 2014. Guardian Inspiring HE leader 2015.</p>

      <div class="ProfileHeaderCard-location ">
        <span class="Icon Icon--geo Icon--medium" aria-hidden="true" role="presentation"></span>
        <span class="ProfileHeaderCard-locationText u-dir" dir="ltr">
              Sheffield

        </span>
      </div>

      <div class="ProfileHeaderCard-url ">
        <span class="Icon Icon--url Icon--medium" aria-hidden="true" role="presentation"></span>
        <span class="ProfileHeaderCard-urlText u-dir">  <a class="u-textUserColor" target="_blank" rel="me nofollow noopener" href="https://t.co/6RiLUqgKjq" title="http://www.paulblomfield.co.uk">
    paulblomfield.co.uk
  </a>

</span>
      </div>

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/PaulBlomfieldMP" data-user-id="377319290">
      <img class="avatar js-action-profile-avatar" src="https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/780327080789671936/1nKchgyO_bigger.jpg" alt="" />
    <span class="FullNameGroup">

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/PaulBlomfieldMP" data-user-id="377319290">

    <span class="FullNameGroup">

      <li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="974292948698451968" id="stream-item-tweet-974292948698451968" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;974292948698451968&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Shadow Brexit Team Retweeted Faisal Islam</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">This is more disturbing evidence of a Government obsessed with secrecy and intent on keeping the public in the dark about their plans for Brexit, <a href="/PaulBlomfieldMP" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="377319290"><s>@</s><b>PaulBlomfieldMP</b></a><a href="https://t.co/9zXleKIpzu" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/faisalislam/status/974227097387454464" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/faisalislam/status/974227097387454464"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/faisalislam/st</span><span class="invisible">atus/974227097387454464</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Shadow Brexit Team added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/faisalislam/status/974227097387454464" data-conversation-id="974227097387454464" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="974227097387454464" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="faisalislam" data-user-id="22812734" href="/faisalislam/status/974227097387454464" data-conversation-id="974227097387454464" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">

      <div class="child-confirmation-item">
        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>
        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">I'm pleased to see South Yorkshire Police respond quickly to these vile letters which aim to create fear and division. Sheffield has a proud tradition of opposing those who promote hatred and we'll stand together against all attempts to do so.<a href="https://t.co/XtjT4YzaE2" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/BBCSheffield/status/973130627850670081" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/BBCSheffield/status/973130627850670081"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/BBCSheffield/s</span><span class="invisible">tatus/973130627850670081</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

    <div class="child-feedback-confirmation">
      <div class="child-confirmation-item">
        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>
        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Paul Blomfield Retweeted Bill Esterson</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Powerful case made by Shadow Trade Minister <a href="/Bill_Esterson" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="120720108"><s>@</s><b>Bill_Esterson</b></a> on how <a href="/UKLabour" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="14291684"><s>@</s><b>UKLabour</b></a> approach to future trade with EU and the rest of the world offers the best outcome for UK jobs and economy.<a href="https://t.co/c5SnnkyGv2" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/bill_esterson/status/973146665157844992" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/bill_esterson/status/973146665157844992"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/bill_esterson/</span><span class="invisible">status/973146665157844992</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Paul Blomfield added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/Bill_Esterson/status/973146665157844992" data-conversation-id="973146665157844992" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="973146665157844992" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="Bill_Esterson" data-user-id="120720108" href="/Bill_Esterson/status/973146665157844992" data-conversation-id="973146665157844992" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Bill Esterson</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>Bill_Esterson</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Why a new customs union with the EU and a close relationship with the single market are right for the UK after Brexit. Labour want trade to continue in as frictionless a manner as possible - the Conservatives are all over the place.  <span rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://www.huffingtonpost.co.uk/entry/single-market_uk_5aa25ba7e4b07047bec54ad4" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://www.huffingtonpost.co.uk/entry/single-market_uk_5aa25ba7e4b07047bec54ad4"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">huffingtonpost.co.uk/entry/single-m</span><span class="invisible">arket_uk_5aa25ba7e4b07047bec54ad4</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></span></div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>

      <span class="Icon Icon--medium Icon--retweet"></span>

    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">9</span>
  </span>

  </button>

    <div class="child-feedback-confirmation">
      <div class="child-confirmation-item">
        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>
        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

</li>

        <span class="u-hiddenVisually">More</span>
      </div>
  </button>
  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>

</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

</li><li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="971378151778586624" id="stream-item-tweet-971378151778586624" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;971378151778586624&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">From Bronte to Beyonce to <a href="/PaulBlomfieldMP" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="377319290"><s>@</s><b>PaulBlomfieldMP</b></a>! </div>

    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo retweet">

    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Graham Walker</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>GW1962</b></span>

          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">SCREENING: Celebrate International Womens Day at The Nelson Mandela Auditorium, Sheffield Students Union, from 6.15pm with film Hidden Figures. <span rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://dlvr.it/QK2h4l" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://dlvr.it/QK2h4l"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://</span><span class="js-display-url">dlvr.it/QK2h4l</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></span> <span class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/Gfg4XjG9zu</span></div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

If you cant make it, but would like to donate: <a href="https://t.co/nJeHiPAnrd" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://www.justgiving.com/fundraising/paul-blomfield" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://www.justgiving.com/fundraising/paul-blomfield"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">justgiving.com/fundraising/pa</span><span class="invisible">ul-blomfield</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a> <span class="twitter-hashflag-container"><a href="/hashtag/IWD2018?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>IWD2018</b></a><a href="/hashtag/IWD2018?src=hash" dir="ltr"><img class="twitter-hashflag" src="https://abs.twimg.com/hashflags/womenshistorymonth2018_v3/womenshistorymonth2018_v3.png" draggable="false" alt="" /></a></span></p>

      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Hopeless, clueless <a href="/BorisJohnson" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="3131144855"><s>@</s><b>BorisJohnson</b></a> on <a href="/r4Today" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="281536059"><s>@</s><b>r4today</b></a> cites growing trade with S.Korea as why we'll be better off without the EU trade deals that come with a Customs Union - conveniently failing to mention the EU/S.Korea deal under which that trade has grown.</p>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Labour puts jobs &amp; the economy first. Business supports. Fox attacks. What sort of government is this that puts hard line Brexit ideology above all else?<a href="https://t.co/cSFUml27HZ" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/thetimes/status/968254354275946497" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/thetimes/status/968254354275946497"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/thetimes/statu</span><span class="invisible">s/968254354275946497</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;       tweet-has-context&#10;       <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">3</span>
  </span>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Matthew Pennycook MP Retweeted Sam Coates Times</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Worth reading the full text of ERGs letter. May sowed the wind with her Lancaster House speech, now she's reaping the whirlwind. Precisely why the sensible majority in Parliament that want a close future relationship with the EU must face these cavalier Brexiteers down.<a href="https://t.co/axyTwr31xj" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/SamCoatesTimes/status/966046024186974209" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/SamCoatesTimes/status/966046024186974209"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/SamCoatesTimes</span><span class="invisible">/status/966046024186974209</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Like</span>

</li><li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="963809113460363269" id="stream-item-tweet-963809113460363269" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;963809113460363269&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">
    


  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;       tweet-has-context&#10;       has-cards  has-content&#10;" data-tweet-id="963809113460363269" data-item-id="963809113460363269" data-permalink-path="/AFCUnity/status/963809113460363269" data-conversation-id="963809113460363269" data-tweet-nonce="963809113460363269-abbe2bc6-1093-4dc7-a9f7-033524becb59" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-retweet-id="964462442007990272" data-retweeter="PaulBlomfieldMP" data-screen-name="AFCUnity" data-name="AFC Unity" data-user-id="2293304034" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-tagged="PaulBlomfieldMP LouHaigh GillFurnissMP" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;2293304034&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;AFCUnity&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;AFC Unity&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;AFC Unity&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;AFC Unity&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;377319290&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;PaulBlomfieldMP&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Paul Blomfield&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Paul Blomfield&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Paul Blomfield&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;143508762&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;LouHaigh&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Louise Haigh MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Louise Haigh MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Louise Haigh MP&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;700732124299714561&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;GillFurnissMP&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Gill Furniss MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Gill Furniss MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Gill Furniss MP&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="" data-has-cards="true">

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Paul Blomfield Retweeted Quantum Light LDSD</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Delighted to catch up on the work of <a href="/ldsd_research" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="3069614175"><s>@</s><b>ldsd_research</b></a>, develop my understanding of quantum physics (a little) and see another area where <a href="/sheffielduni" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="19341622"><s>@</s><b>sheffielduni</b></a> is an international leader <a href="/hashtag/sheffieldissuper?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>sheffieldissuper</b></a><a href="https://t.co/utKIMOoquY" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/ldsd_research/status/964198910678982658" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/ldsd_research/status/964198910678982658"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/ldsd_research/</span><span class="invisible">status/964198910678982658</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Paul Blomfield added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/ldsd_research/status/964198910678982658" data-conversation-id="964198910678982658" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="964198910678982658" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="ldsd_research" data-user-id="3069614175" href="/ldsd_research/status/964198910678982658" data-conversation-id="964198910678982658" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
            <div class="QuoteMedia">
      <div class="QuoteMedia-container js-quote-media-container">
          <div class="QuoteMedia-singlePhoto">
    <div class="QuoteMedia-photoContainer js-quote-photo" data-image-url="https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DWGDBdOWkAEHlSW.jpg" data-element-context="platform_photo_card" style="background-color:rgba(64,52,41,1.0);" data-dominant-color="[64,52,41]">

          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">It was a pleasure to welcome <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="377319290"><s>@</s><b>PaulBlomfieldMP</b></span> and talk about the research and science in our group and <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="138883817"><s>@</s><b>PhysicsShef</b></span> <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="2904940865"><s>@</s><b>EpitaxyFacility</b></span> <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="19341622"><s>@</s><b>sheffielduni</b></span> <span rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://ldsd.group.shef.ac.uk/the-group-met-with-paul-blomfield-mp/" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://ldsd.group.shef.ac.uk/the-group-met-with-paul-blomfield-mp/"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">ldsd.group.shef.ac.uk/the-group-met-</span><span class="invisible">with-paul-blomfield-mp/</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></span> <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Sheffield</b></span> </div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">3 more speeches, 3 more views. 20 months since referendum, 8 months until agreement needed, Tories still no clearer on the future deal they want.<a href="https://t.co/glPnxY8BV0" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-politics-43021291" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-politics-43021291"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">bbc.co.uk/news/uk-politi</span><span class="invisible">cs-43021291</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">3</span>
  </span>

  </button>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">1</span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>


    

    

  </div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">We are trying to help with the reported <a href="/hashtag/Loneliness?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Loneliness</b></a> and <a href="/hashtag/SocialIsolation?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>SocialIsolation</b></a> of modern times by promoting the <a href="/hashtag/SheffFriends?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>SheffFriends</b></a> hashtag for people to use and chat. Please share.<a href="https://t.co/tLBaFDMCnj" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/tLBaFDMCnj</a></p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Ive signed the Holocaust Educational Trust Book of Commitment. On Holocaust Memorial Day tomorrow we remember the millions of victims, pay tribute to the survivors and commit to building a world free of hatred <a href="/HolocaustUK" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="236389590"><s>@</s><b>HolocaustUK</b></a><a href="https://t.co/2JFjH2FWTI" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/2JFjH2FWTI</a></p>
</div>

      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Powerful critique of Tory failure on housing by <a href="/JohnHealey_MP" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="376161322"><s>@</s><b>JohnHealey_MP</b></a> as he sets out Labours plans to tackle the housing crisis at <a href="/Sheff_Cen_CLP" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="469480876"><s>@</s><b>Sheff_Cen_CLP</b></a> meeting<a href="https://t.co/oUGdNHweZQ" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/oUGdNHweZQ</a></p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">I've sent out my first newsletter of 2018, covering my work in Parliament and Sheffield over the last month, including on Brexit, Carillion, international students, legal aid, the NHS and more.<a href="https://t.co/Nkq72pYziH" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://www.paulblomfield.co.uk/keeping_in_touch_january_2018" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="http://www.paulblomfield.co.uk/keeping_in_touch_january_2018"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">paulblomfield.co.uk/keeping_in_tou</span><span class="invisible">ch_january_2018</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>

        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>
        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Despite our best efforts to improve it in Committee, the <a href="/hashtag/EUWithdrawalBill?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>EUWithdrawalBill</b></a> passed its Third Reading this evening largely unamended. It remains a deeply flawed piece of legislation and for that reason <a href="/UKLabour" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="14291684"><s>@</s><b>UKLabour</b></a> voted against it.</p>
</div>

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;      &#10;       &#10;" data-tweet-id="953277131265626113" data-item-id="953277131265626113" data-permalink-path="/PaulBlomfieldMP/status/953277131265626113" data-conversation-id="953277131265626113" data-tweet-nonce="953277131265626113-5a141e52-a5a4-404f-b470-614cc719ad84" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-screen-name="PaulBlomfieldMP" data-name="Paul Blomfield" data-user-id="377319290" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-mentions="ShefDevelopment" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;377319290&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;PaulBlomfieldMP&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Paul Blomfield&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Paul Blomfield&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Paul Blomfield&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;897773836657209344&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;ShefDevelopment&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Megan McGrath&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Megan McGrath&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Megan McGrath&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="">

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Paul Blomfield Retweeted Megan McGrath</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Pleased to back your <a href="/hashtag/StrawFreeSheffield?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>StrawFreeSheffield</b></a> campaign <a href="/ShefDevelopment" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="897773836657209344"><s>@</s><b>ShefDevelopment</b></a> We need comprehensive action to stop plastic waste.<a href="https://t.co/KybtZlG0bt" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/shefdevelopment/status/953234454155288579" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/shefdevelopment/status/953234454155288579"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/shefdevelopmen</span><span class="invisible">t/status/953234454155288579</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Paul Blomfield added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/ShefDevelopment/status/953234454155288579" data-conversation-id="953234454155288579" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="953234454155288579" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="ShefDevelopment" data-user-id="897773836657209344" href="/ShefDevelopment/status/953234454155288579" data-conversation-id="953234454155288579" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Megan McGrath</b><span class="UserBadges"></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>ShefDevelopment</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Our MP <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="377319290"><s>@</s><b>PaulBlomfieldMP</b></span> asked a question to the Sec of State for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs what steps his Department is taking to reduce the use of  plastic straws. Big thanks to Paul for getting on board with the <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>StrawFreeSheffield</b></span> campaign!</div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">The Government claims the Charter of Fundamental Rights contains no human rights outside UK law.

But the new Brexit Minister said last year it contained an extra layer of human right protections.

Who is correct? <img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f914.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Thinking face" aria-label="Emoji: Thinking face" />

RT to share.<a href="https://t.co/SZ7XGqXRhM" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://www.theguardian.com/politics/2018/jan/15/suella-fernandes-new-brexit-minister-eu-charter-human-rights" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://www.theguardian.com/politics/2018/jan/15/suella-fernandes-new-brexit-minister-eu-charter-human-rights"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">theguardian.com/politics/2018/</span><span class="invisible">jan/15/suella-fernandes-new-brexit-minister-eu-charter-human-rights</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;       tweet-has-context&#10; </li><li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="952925991797739521" id="stream-item-tweet-952925991797739521" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;952925991797739521&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;       tweet-has-context&#10;       has-cards  has-content&#10;" data-tweet-id="951406600509624326" data-item-id="951406600509624326" data-permalink-path="/weareintl/status/951406600509624326" data-conversation-id="951406600509624326" data-tweet-nonce="951406600509624326-e8d5f2ef-13ef-40b1-b78b-9139af621cb8" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-retweet-id="951452054735740928" data-retweeter="PaulBlomfieldMP" data-screen-name="weareintl" data-name="#WeAreInternational" data-user-id="1943738238" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-mentions="HEPI_news PaulBlomfieldMP APPGIS" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;1943738238&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;weareintl&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;#WeAreInternational&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;#WeAreInternational&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;#WeAreInternational&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;377319290&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;PaulBlomfieldMP&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Paul Blomfield&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Paul Blomfield&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Paul Blomfield&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;299638999&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;HEPI_news&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;HEPI&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;HEPI&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;HEPI&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;852181130975608833&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;APPGIS&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;APPG Int'l Students&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;APPG Int'l Students&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;APPG Int&amp;#39;l Students&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="" data-has-cards="true">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">In light of the <a href="/HEPI_news" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="299638999"><s>@</s><b>HEPI_news</b></a> report on international students today, <a href="/PaulBlomfieldMP" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="377319290"><s>@</s><b>PaulBlomfieldMP</b></a>, co-chair of the <a href="/APPGIS" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="852181130975608833"><s>@</s><b>APPGIS</b></a> has once again highlighted how vital it is to welcome int'l students to the UK - UK can't afford to lose these incredible students <a href="/hashtag/WeAreInternational?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>WeAreInternational</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/StudentsOfTheWorld?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>StudentsOfTheWorld</b></a><a href="https://t.co/L26jiR2cLi" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/L26jiR2cLi</a></p>

          <div class="action-confirmation dismiss-module-item">Thanks. Twitter will use this info to make your timeline better.
            <span class="undo-action">Undo</span>

    </div>
  </div>
</div>

    <div class="child-feedback-confirmation">
      <div class="child-confirmation-item">
        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>
        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Cancelled operations, ambulances backed up outside hospitals, patients on trolleys in corridors. This is a crisis.  Weve had years of funding squeeze, cuts to community health provision, 14,000 beds lost, 100,000 vacancies &amp; severe cuts to social care<a href="https://t.co/mLZom2htwb" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://news.sky.com/story/hospitals-told-to-cancel-some-operations-amid-winter-pressure-11193433" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://news.sky.com/story/hospitals-told-to-cancel-some-operations-amid-winter-pressure-11193433"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">news.sky.com/story/hospital</span><span class="invisible">s-told-to-cancel-some-operations-amid-winter-pressure-11193433</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">NEW: Red faces at Home Office after black passport turns blue

The Tories claimed the new passport was a symbol of restoring British sovereignty. But it has quickly become a symbol of the governments incompetence instead. <a href="/PaulBlomfieldMP" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="377319290"><s>@</s><b>PaulBlomfieldMP</b></a><a href="https://t.co/9HXNab2NDu" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://www.thetimes.co.uk/article/red-faces-at-home-office-after-black-passport-turns-blue-6b9fz2g58" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://www.thetimes.co.uk/article/red-faces-at-home-office-after-black-passport-turns-blue-6b9fz2g58"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">thetimes.co.uk/article/red-fa</span><span class="invisible">ces-at-home-office-after-black-passport-turns-blue-6b9fz2g58</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

  <button class="ProfileTweet-actionButton u-textUserColorHover dropdown-toggle js-dropdown-toggle" type="button" aria-haspopup="true">

        <span class="Icon Icon--caretDownLight Icon--small"></span>
        <span class="u-hiddenVisually">More</span>
      </div>
  </button>
  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Would anyone be interested in becoming a Friend of Mount Pleasant Park for 2018? We may be down to a single member at some point this year.</p>
</div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Really powerful and moving interviews about the incredible work of Sheffield child obesity charity <a href="/SHINEHealthAcad" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="1632415081"><s>@</s><b>SHINEHealthAcad</b></a> on Toby Fosters show: <a href="https://t.co/zG8aZMKGeH" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://www.bbc.co.uk/programmes/p05mvy6m#t=1h09m20s" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://www.bbc.co.uk/programmes/p05mvy6m#t=1h09m20s"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">bbc.co.uk/programmes/p05</span><span class="invisible">mvy6m#t=1h09m20s</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a>  
Please listen &amp; sign their petition:<a href="https://t.co/wTpY3fNdao" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/205447" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/205447"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">petition.parliament.uk/petitions/2054</span><span class="invisible">47</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

  </div>

  <div class="ProfileTweet-actionList js-actions" role="group" aria-label="Tweet actions">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">On the two year anniversary of the <a href="/hashtag/ParisAgreement?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>ParisAgreement</b></a>, I'm pleased to join 100 other MPs in a cross-party pledge to <a href="/hashtag/DivestParliament?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>DivestParliament</b></a> from fossil fuels.<a href="https://t.co/IyPtU3TjRu" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://gofossilfree.org/uk/divest-parliament/" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://gofossilfree.org/uk/divest-parliament/"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">gofossilfree.org/uk/divest-parl</span><span class="invisible">iament/</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">12</span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>

  </span>

  </button>

</li><li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="937699058621337601" id="stream-item-tweet-937699058621337601" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;937699058621337601&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

</li><li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="933998633275613185" id="stream-item-tweet-933998633275613185" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;933998633275613185&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

</li><li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="933640460689707008" id="stream-item-tweet-933640460689707008" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;933640460689707008&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">
    


  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;       tweet-has-context&#10;       has-cards  has-content&#10;" data-tweet-id="933640460689707008" data-item-id="933640460689707008" data-permalink-path="/SheffFutures/status/933640460689707008" data-conversation-id="933640460689707008" data-tweet-nonce="933640460689707008-324e15a5-6be1-4b89-bdb5-2b3c8cf47cc1" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-retweet-id="933681722595659776" data-retweeter="PaulBlomfieldMP" data-screen-name="SheffFutures" data-name="Sheffield Futures" data-user-id="66685085" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-mentions="SheffieldTM SheffieldStar" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;66685085&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;SheffFutures&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Sheffield Futures&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Sheffield Futures&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Sheffield Futures&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;377319290&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;PaulBlomfieldMP&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Paul Blomfield&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Paul Blomfield&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Paul Blomfield&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;934769497&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;SheffieldTM&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;TalentMatchSCR&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;TalentMatchSCR&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;TalentMatchSCR&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;29011733&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;SheffieldStar&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;The Star, Sheffield&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;The Star, Sheffield&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;The Star, Sheffield&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="" data-has-cards="true">

Roundabout supports young people &amp; provides them with the help they need.   </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo js-actionButton js-actionRetweet" data-modal="ProfileTweet-retweet" type="button">

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Paul Blomfield Retweeted I was a JSA claimant</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">I've followed up on the non-answer by writing to the Work and Pensions Secretary seeking a clear statement on the maximum repayments for advances on <a href="/hashtag/UniversalCredit?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>UniversalCredit</b></a><a href="https://t.co/kEBxLu9RLH" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/imajsaclaimant/status/930526594325733376" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/imajsaclaimant/status/930526594325733376"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/imajsaclaimant</span><span class="invisible">/status/930526594325733376</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Paul Blomfield added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/imajsaclaimant/status/930526594325733376" data-conversation-id="930526594325733376" aria-hidden="true">

      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">

    <span class="ProfileTweet-action--retweet u-hiddenVisually">

    <span class="ProfileTweet-action--favorite u-hiddenVisually">

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Important decision tonight securing transparency and accountability on <a href="/hashtag/Brexit?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Brexit</b></a> through <a href="/UKLabour" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="14291684"><s>@</s><b>UKLabour</b></a> motion to House of Commons<a href="https://t.co/gjHd4TpFvA" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/JennyChapman/status/925798490374131712" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/JennyChapman/status/925798490374131712"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/JennyChapman/s</span><span class="invisible">tatus/925798490374131712</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

  </div>
</div>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Paul Blomfield Retweeted Make Votes Matter #MVM</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Pleased to be joined by so many MPs arguing for PR. Thanks to all who petitioned for the debate. We're winning the case to <a href="/MakeVotesMatter" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="3245179401"><s>@</s><b>MakeVotesMatter</b></a><a href="https://t.co/DTiflsU4NQ" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/MakeVotesMatter/status/925072464228618240" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/MakeVotesMatter/status/925072464228618240"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/MakeVotesMatte</span><span class="invisible">r/status/925072464228618240</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Paul Blomfield added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">

    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Make Votes Matter #MVM</b><span class="UserBadges"></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>MakeVotesMatter</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Excellent speech by <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="3304523943"><s>@</s><b>Labour4PR</b></span> Chair <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="377319290"><s>@</s><b>PaulBlomfieldMP</b></span> noting that societies with PR tend to be more equal &amp; egalitarian than those with FPTP</div>

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;      &#10;       has-cards &#10;" data-tweet-id="924025068400889857" data-item-id="924025068400889857" data-permalink-path="/PaulBlomfieldMP/status/924025068400889857" data-conversation-id="924025068400889857" data-tweet-nonce="924025068400889857-59dd72d2-911b-4eb2-99cc-6e179a574d61" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-screen-name="PaulBlomfieldMP" data-name="Paul Blomfield" data-user-id="377319290" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-mentions="NickJohnW" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;377319290&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;PaulBlomfieldMP&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Paul Blomfield&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Paul Blomfield&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Paul Blomfield&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;2491884968&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;NickJohnW&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Nick John W&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Nick John W&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Nick John W&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="" data-card2-type="summary" data-has-cards="true">

      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">1</span>
  </span>

  </button>

    <div class="child-feedback-confirmation">
      <div class="child-confirmation-item">
        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>
        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/JoCoxLoneliness" data-user-id="821010896063463426">

        <div class="feedback-action" data-feedback-type="DontLike" data-feedback-url="">
          <div class="action-confirmation dismiss-module-item">Thanks. Twitter will use this info to make your timeline better.
            <span class="undo-action">Undo</span>

          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/NIAUK" data-user-id="68702688">

      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">

      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">"The Government must recognise the gravity of the situation...and work round the clock to find a resolution." - <a href="/Keir_Starmer" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="2425571623"><s>@</s><b>Keir_Starmer</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/Brexit?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Brexit</b></a><a href="https://t.co/3OMSG3NPBX" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/labourpress/status/918444626276741121" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/labourpress/status/918444626276741121"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/labourpress/st</span><span class="invisible">atus/918444626276741121</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Another day, another split. Tory chaos paralysing Brexit process.   <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Pleased to join <a href="/tony4rochdale" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="23452834"><s>@</s><b>tony4rochdale</b></a> &amp; colleagues meeting <a href="/WASPI_Campaign" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="3622059147"><s>@</s><b>WASPI_Campaign</b></a> Sign their new petition <a href="https://t.co/iAv0uKJnrd" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/200088" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/200088"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">petition.parliament.uk/petitions/2000</span><span class="invisible">88</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a><a href="https://t.co/1XypLxB065" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/1XypLxB065</a></p>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Keir Starmer Retweeted Mirror Politics</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">This is the problem when you use people as bargaining chips. If the bargain fails, they suffer.<a href="https://t.co/TRI2XEYE9Y" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/mirrorpolitics/status/917797378748542976" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/mirrorpolitics/status/917797378748542976"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/mirrorpolitics</span><span class="invisible">/status/917797378748542976</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Keir Starmer added,</p>

      </li>

        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Great to see <a href="/PaulBlomfieldMP" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="377319290"><s>@</s><b>PaulBlomfieldMP</b></a> engaging so many constituents for <a href="/hashtag/paulsbigconversation?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>paulsbigconversation</b></a>.           <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Paul Blomfield Retweeted Barbara Keeley</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Thanks to <a href="/KeeleyMP" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="331178901"><s>@</s><b>KeeleyMP</b></a> and all who came to share their views on health and social care. Really useful discussion at today's Big Conversation<a href="https://t.co/kERxrf4AVg" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/keeleymp/status/916668086748614657" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/keeleymp/status/916668086748614657"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/keeleymp/statu</span><span class="invisible">s/916668086748614657</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Paul Blomfield added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/KeeleyMP/status/916668086748614657" data-conversation-id="916668086748614657" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="916668086748614657" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="KeeleyMP" data-user-id="331178901" href="/KeeleyMP/status/916668086748614657" data-conversation-id="916668086748614657" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
            <div class="QuoteMedia">
      <div class="QuoteMedia-container js-quote-media-container">
          <div class="QuoteMedia-singlePhoto">

          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Fantastic turn out for <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="377319290"><s>@</s><b>PaulBlomfieldMP</b></span> tonight <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="361892754"><s>@</s><b>SheffieldMind</b></span>.   <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">"This is a direct consequence of the disarray in the Cabinet and the Tories' chaotic approach to negotiations." - <a href="/PaulBlomfieldMP" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="377319290"><s>@</s><b>PaulBlomfieldMP</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/Brexit?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Brexit</b></a><a href="https://t.co/3q0PGzLdc3" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/3q0PGzLdc3</a></p>

  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Great to meet up with <a href="/TraceyfordyFord" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="3327487349"><s>@</s><b>TraceyfordyFord</b></a> at <a href="/PaulBlomfieldMP" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="377319290"><s>@</s><b>PaulBlomfieldMP</b></a> s <a href="/hashtag/thebigconversation?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>thebigconversation</b></a> event discussing issues relating to the city centre<a href="https://t.co/CFFqxGqtcO" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/CFFqxGqtcO</a></p>

      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ">
        <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">1</span>
      </span>
  </button>
</div>

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;      &#10;       has-cards &#10;" data-tweet-id="913511640288649216" data-item-id="913511640288649216" data-permalink-path="/PaulBlomfieldMP/status/913511640288649216" data-conversation-id="913511640288649216" data-tweet-nonce="913511640288649216-7284c67a-eb66-4fa7-b7a6-c3a89eb49da1" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-screen-name="PaulBlomfieldMP" data-name="Paul Blomfield" data-user-id="377319290" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;377319290&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;PaulBlomfieldMP&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Paul Blomfield&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Paul Blomfield&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Paul Blomfield&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="" data-card2-type="summary" data-has-cards="true">

    <div class="context">
      
      
    </div>

    <div class="content">
      

      

      
      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/PaulBlomfieldMP" data-user-id="377319290">
      <img class="avatar js-action-profile-avatar" src="https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/780327080789671936/1nKchgyO_bigger.jpg" alt="" />
    <span class="FullNameGroup">
      <strong class="fullname show-popup-with-id u-textTruncate ">Paul Blomfield</strong><span></span><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>PaulBlomfieldMP</b></span></a>

        
        <small class="time">

      <strong class="fullname show-popup-with-id u-textTruncate ">SCCRAG Sheffield</strong><span></span><span class="UserBadges"></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>SCCRAG</b></span></a>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">SCCRAG Sheffield Retweeted The Star, Sheffield</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">A great opportunity for city centre residents to ask <a href="/PaulBlomfieldMP" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="377319290"><s>@</s><b>PaulBlomfieldMP</b></a> those burning questions on your mind<a href="https://t.co/6YgVL2vVrJ" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/sheffieldstar/status/913100694080692226" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/sheffieldstar/status/913100694080692226"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/sheffieldstar/</span><span class="invisible">status/913100694080692226</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/PaulBlomfieldMP" data-user-id="377319290">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Im holding a Big Conversation about crime &amp; antisocial behaviour with <a href="/SYPCC" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="175354923"><s>@</s><b>SYPCC</b></a> on Monday <a href="/hashtag/paulsbigconversation?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>paulsbigconversation</b></a> <a href="https://t.co/pWNPt3Hn4j" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://www.facebook.com/events/457416014657371/" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://www.facebook.com/events/457416014657371/"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">facebook.com/events/4574160</span><span class="invisible">14657371/</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a><a href="https://t.co/RGdBvYhKzX" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/RGdBvYhKzX</a></p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Always get good feedback from <a href="/PaulBlomfieldMP" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="377319290"><s>@</s><b>PaulBlomfieldMP</b></a><a href="https://t.co/bPaDYB2BpR" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/sccrag/status/912283414811877376" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/sccrag/status/912283414811877376"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/sccrag/status/</span><span class="invisible">912283414811877376</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Pleased to catch up again with the great work of <a href="/SheffCityofSanc" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="761517931582910464"><s>@</s><b>SheffCityofSanc</b></a> - to meet volunteers and talk with refugees &amp; asylum-seekers<a href="https://t.co/sOgL6l9JAB" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/dewaproject/status/911242254999834624" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/dewaproject/status/911242254999834624"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/dewaproject/st</span><span class="invisible">atus/911242254999834624</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;      &#10;       &#10;" data-tweet-id="911528098239320064" data-item-id="911528098239320064" data-permalink-path="/PaulBlomfieldMP/status/911528098239320064" data-conversation-id="911528098239320064" data-tweet-nonce="911528098239320064-fb222fc2-3bfb-4d89-8540-d3d80d985a8c" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-screen-name="PaulBlomfieldMP" data-name="Paul Blomfield" data-user-id="377319290" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-mentions="SheffFutures" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;377319290&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;PaulBlomfieldMP&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Paul Blomfield&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Paul Blomfield&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Paul Blomfield&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;66685085&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;SheffFutures&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Sheffield Futures&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Sheffield Futures&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Sheffield Futures&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="">

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Paul Blomfield Retweeted Sam Jackson</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Thanks to all who came along to share their views and experiences - and to <a href="/SheffFutures" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="66685085"><s>@</s><b>SheffFutures</b></a> for organising the event.<a href="https://t.co/L2HmWDJKq5" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/samjackson_star/status/911183108875198464" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/samjackson_star/status/911183108875198464"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/samjackson_sta</span><span class="invisible">r/status/911183108875198464</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Paul Blomfield added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/samjackson_star/status/911183108875198464" data-conversation-id="911183108875198464" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="911183108875198464" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="samjackson_star" data-user-id="525603073" href="/samjackson_star/status/911183108875198464" data-conversation-id="911183108875198464" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Sam Jackson</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>samjackson_star</b></span>
  </div>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Unsurprisingly we were comprehensively beaten. But we were up against gold medallists in a great evening with <a href="/SheffieldSmash2" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="3459837077"><s>@</s><b>SheffieldSmash2</b></a><a href="https://t.co/zLBeWbIi7M" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/llyaklingard/status/910918246144135168" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/llyaklingard/status/910918246144135168"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/llyaklingard/s</span><span class="invisible">tatus/910918246144135168</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">3</span>
  </span>

  </button>

          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/PaulBlomfieldMP" data-user-id="377319290">

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Paul Blomfield Retweeted Sheffield Futures</p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">I learnt a lot from some really impressive young people. Thanks to everyone who came along.         <span class="u-hiddenVisually">More</span>
      </div>
  </button>
  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>

  </ul>
</div>

  </div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Great to speak to local residents on some of the local issues at <a href="/AmiciandBici" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="1201192950"><s>@</s><b>AmiciandBici</b></a> with <a href="/PaulBlomfieldMP" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="377319290"><s>@</s><b>PaulBlomfieldMP</b></a> @CllrJimSteinkie at <a href="/hashtag/BigConversation?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>BigConversation</b></a><a href="https://t.co/OGe4P2QXuz" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/OGe4P2QXuz</a></p>
